lead_paragraph: It could serve no purpose to attempt to minimize the gravity of Japan's successes in the Far East during the past few days. The whole of Malaya has been lost and the British Imperial Forces "stand beleaguered" in their island fortress of Singapore. Moulmein, second largest port of Burma, has fallen, putting the Japanese on the direct route to Rangoon, the sea terminus of the Burma Road.
